slogan: Boilerplate and Tooling for FE development.
forDetails: See the README.md file of this repository for usage details.

features.title: Live Browser Reloading
features.detail: Reload the browser in real-time anytime an edit is made with BrowserSync across multiple connected devices.

features.title: Performance optimization
features.detail: Minify and concatenate JavaScript, CSS, HTML and Images to help keep pages lean.

features.title: Jade Support
features.detail: Never worry about unclosed HTML tags again. Jade also supports dynamic code and reusability.

features.title: Stylus + Nib / Kouto-Swiss Support
features.detail: Expressive, dynamic, robust CSS. Includes automated prefixing and more.

features.title: CoffeeScript Support
features.detail: Code quick, code concise; output 'clean' JavaScript/JQuery

features.title: Babel (ES2015) Support
features.detail: For the Babel lovers, we've got you.

contactMsg:
Thank you for contacting us!
Your message has been sent successfully and we’ll get back to you soon.
Or you may also give us a call if this issue is urgent. We wish you a nice day!

感谢您联系我们，您的讯息已成功发送至我们的接收专员，我们将尽快反馈您的洽询。
如您的洽询要求尽快回复，请您直接致电我们。再次感谢，顺祝安康！

aboutUtune.text:
This is UTUNE
We insist on Transboundary Insight
And Original design
With Innovative spirit
Creating business opportunities by
Ensouling the products.
aboutUtune.footer_text:
We do  branding strategy, products creative. production and logistics operation or management, space design
We make brands stand out and stand for something.

weDoSlider.title: 品牌沟通
weDoSlider.content:
塑造品牌就是塑造一种气质。
我们希望通过我们的设计，可以让品牌与客户之间用简洁、清晰、直观的沟通方式，达成有效的视觉沟通和传播。力图从品牌角度启迪客户以崭新的方式思考和行动，使他们逐步成为品牌的倡导者。

weDoSlider.title: 产品策划
weDoSlider.content: 优秀的产品扮演着商业路径中每一次跳跃的起点，我们凭借多年的经验，赋予产品无形的技术，利用符号学、语言学的表达方式，以优美的造型，提升产品价值感与竞争力。

weDoSlider.title: 供应链管理
weDoSlider.content:
塑造品牌就是塑造一种气质。
我们希望通过我们的设计，可以让品牌与客户之间用简洁、清晰、直观的沟通方式，达成有效的视觉沟通和传播。力图从品牌角度启迪客户以崭新的方式思考和行动，使他们逐步成为品牌的倡导者。

weDoSlider.title: 空间设计
weDoSlider.content:
塑造品牌就是塑造一种气质。
我们希望通过我们的设计，可以让品牌与客户之间用简洁、清晰、直观的沟通方式，达成有效的视觉沟通和传播。力图从品牌角度启迪客户以崭新的方式思考和行动，使他们逐步成为品牌的倡导者。

management.title: 供应链管理
management.subTitle: Logistical Management
management.zh:
随着市场竞争日益激烈，供应链管理突显重要地位，以更好的性价比满足日益丰富的产品需求及日趋紧张的预算。
我们一直在努力提高供应链管理能力，尤其是采购管理能力，致力于以更优的成本控制，提供更高品质的产品。我们帮助客户更好的整合各项采购元素与资源：
以最合适的价格
最合适的时间
最合适的地点
最合适的质量
购买到最适量的产品
悦动力以极其丰富的供应商资源，专业的原材料生产知识背景，严格的供应商准入审核流程和询价流程，第三方SGS及ITS的专业检测与验货机构的配合。保证以精准的成本，为客户提供优质安全的合格产品。
management.en:
As the market competition becoming fierce, supply chain management plays an important role in meeting the increasing demand for products and the increasingly tight budget.
We have been working hard to improve the supply chain management capabilities, especially the procurement management , committed to offer our clients higher quality products with better cost control.
We offer our clients better solution for the integration of procurement elements and resources:
Right Price
Right Time
Right Place
Right Quality
Right Quantity
With extremely rich supplier resources, professional knowledge of raw materials background, strict supplier audit process and bidding procedure, recognized third party (like SGS and ITS) testing and inspection, Utune aims at providing customer high quality and safety products with accurate cost.

management.title: 质量保证与控制
management.subTitle: Quality assurance and control
management.zh:
我们运用先进的质量管理体系和相应的管理工具与完善的控制流程来达成精细质量管理模式。
这些管理体系包括：
产品质量先期策划
统计过程控制
潜在的失效模式及后果分析
测量系统分析
生产件批准程序
根据国标，设定产品质量标准，进行风险评估，从产品原材料采购开始进行把控，跟踪与记录
生产过程，按照质量文件进行检测与验货，并保证产品的可追溯性，力求保证产品的质量与安全。
management.en:
We use advanced quality management system with appropriate management tools
and improved control process to achieve the fine quality management.
APQP（Advanced Product Quality Planning）
SPC（Statistical Process Control）
FMEA (Potential Failure Mode and Effects Analysis)
MSA （Measurement System Analysis）
PPAP (Production part approval process)
We fix the quality criterions and carry out according to the national standard,
risk assessment, procurement of raw materials from products began to control,
tracking and recording the production process, inspection and inspection in
accordance with the quality documents, and to ensure the traceability of products,
to ensure product quality and safety.

management.title: 供应商管理
management.subTitle: Supplier Management
management.zh:
良好的供应商关系是提供低价优质产品的最好保证，只有双赢的关系才是最稳固的关系。悦动力致力于与客户和供应商进行良性合作，发展战略伙伴关系，以保证长期的合作共赢。
但是悦动力有严格的供应商准入、审核及评估流程。我们遵守，"Q、C、D、S"原则，对：质量、成本、交付、服务全面评估与管理。最大限度地提高供应商的竞争力，从而保证产品的最佳性价比。
management.en:
Positive supplier relationship and virtuous cycle is the best guarantee to provide the best quality products. The Win-win relationship is the most stable structure. We are committed to working with our customers and suppliers to develop a strategic partnership to ensure long-term win-win cooperation.
But Utune has fairly strict supplier audit and evaluation process to start cooperation.
"Q, C, D, S" principles: "quality, cost, delivery, service" are the basic principles we comply with to ensure overall assessment and management. So that we can maximize the competitiveness of suppliers, to ensure the best cost performance.

management.title: 仓储物流管理
management.subTitle: Warehouse and logistics management
management.zh:
我公司具备货运物流承运资质，多年为客户提供仓储物流服务。
我们同时为客户提供相关的后期组装、包装、打码、贴唛、客户服务等增值服务，提高客户满意度。
我们服务团队具备进出口及国际物流经验，提供各种运输及货款结算方式。
management.en:
Our company has cargo logistics carrier qualification, and have offered
such services for many years.
We also provide relevant post assembly, packaging, printing, paste mark,
customer service and other value-added services, improving customer
satisfaction.
We are experience in import/export and international logistics, providing
a full range of assistance in transportation and payment settlement.
